.. _class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`int<class_int>` **amount** = ``8`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_amount**\ (\ value\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ )
- :ref:`int<class_int>` **get_amount**\ (\ )

ä¸€ä¸ªå‘å°„å‘¨æœŸå†…å‘å°„çš„ç²’å­æ•°ã€‚æœ‰æ•ˆå‘å°„é€Ÿç‡ä¸ºæ¯ç§’ ``(amount * amount_ratio) / lifetime`` ä¸ªç²’å­ã€‚è¾ƒé«˜çš„å€¼ä¼šå¢åŠ  GPU è¦æ±‚ï¼Œå³ä½¿åœ¨ç»™å®šæ—¶é—´å¹¶éæ‰€æœ‰ç²’å­éƒ½å¯è§æˆ– :ref:`amount_ratio<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio>` å‡å°‘ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ æ›´æ”¹è¯¥å€¼å°†å¯¼è‡´ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿé‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨ã€‚ä¸ºäº†é¿å…è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œè¯·æ›´æ”¹ :ref:`amount_ratio<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_amount_ratio**\ (\ value\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ )
- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_amount_ratio**\ (\ )

å®é™…åº”è¯¥å‘å°„çš„ç²’å­çš„æ¯”ç‡ã€‚å¦‚æœè¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸ºä½äº ``1.0`` çš„å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šå°†æ•´ä¸ªç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå†…å‘å°„çš„ç²’å­æ•°é‡è®¾ç½®ä¸º ``amount * amount_ratio``\ ã€‚ä¸æ›´æ”¹ :ref:`amount<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount>` ä¸åŒï¼Œå‘å°„æ—¶æ›´æ”¹ :ref:`amount_ratio<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio>` ä¸ä¼šå½±å“å·²å‘å°„çš„ç²’å­ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿé‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨ã€‚\ :ref:`amount_ratio<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio>` å¯ç”¨äºåˆ›å»ºä½¿å‘å°„ç²’å­çš„æ•°é‡éšæ—¶é—´å˜åŒ–çš„æ•ˆæœã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å‡å°‘ :ref:`amount_ratio<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio>` ä¸ä¼šå¸¦æ¥æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ— è®º :ref:`amount_ratio<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio>` æ˜¯å¤šå°‘ï¼Œéƒ½éœ€è¦ä¸ºç²’å­æ€»æ•° :ref:`amount<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount>` åˆ†é…å’Œå¤„ç†èµ„æºã€‚å¦‚æœä½ ä¸æ‰“ç®—åœ¨ç²’å­å‘å°„æ—¶æ›´æ”¹å‘å°„çš„ç²’å­æ•°é‡ï¼Œè¯·ç¡®ä¿å°† :ref:`amount_ratio<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount_ratio>` è®¾ç½®ä¸º ``1`` å¹¶æ ¹æ®ä½ çš„å–œå¥½æ›´æ”¹ :ref:`amount<class_GPUParticles3D_property_amount>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_GPUParticles3D_property_draw_pass_1:

- :ref:`Skin<class_Skin>` **get_skin**\ (\ )

.. container:: contribute

	ç›®å‰æ²¡æœ‰è¿™ä¸ªå±æ€§çš„æè¿°ã€‚è¯·å¸®æˆ‘ä»¬\ :ref:`è´¡çŒ®ä¸€ä¸ª <doc_updating_the_class_reference>`\ ï¼

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GPUParticles3D_property_emitting:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **emitting** = ``true`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GPUParticles3D_property_emitting>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_emitting**\ (\ value\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ )
- :ref:`bool<class_bool>` **is_emitting**\ (\ )

If ``true``, particles are being emitted. :ref:`emitting<class_GPUParticles3D_property_emitting>` can be used to start and stop particles from emitting. However, if :ref:`one_shot<class_GPUParticles3D_property_one_shot>` is ``true`` setting :ref:`emitting<class_GPUParticles3D_property_emitting>` to ``true`` will not restart the emission cycle unless all active particles have finished processing. Use the :ref:`finished<class_GPUParticles3D_signal_finished>` signal to be notified once all active particles finish processing.

\ **Note:** For :ref:`one_shot<class_GPUParticles3D_property_one_shot>` emitters, due to the particles being computed on the GPU, there may be a short period after receiving the :ref:`finished<class_GPUParticles3D_signal_finished>` signal during which setting this to ``true`` will not restart the emission cycle.

\ **Tip:** If your :ref:`one_shot<class_GPUParticles3D_property_one_shot>` emitter needs to immediately restart emitting particles once :ref:`finished<class_GPUParticles3D_signal_finished>` signal is received, consider calling :ref:`restart<class_GPUParticles3D_method_restart>` instead of setting :ref:`emitting<class_GPUParticles3D_property_emitting>`.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GPUParticles3D_property_explosiveness:

- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_explosiveness_ratio**\ (\ )

:ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` ç¡®å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åŒºåŸŸï¼Œè¯¥åŒºåŸŸéœ€è¦åœ¨å±å¹•ä¸Šå¯è§ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½ä½¿ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿå¤„äºæ´»åŠ¨çŠ¶æ€ã€‚\ :ref:`GeometryInstance3D.extra_cull_margin<class_GeometryInstance3D_property_extra_cull_margin>` è¢«æ·»åŠ åˆ° AABB çš„æ¯ä¸ªè½´ä¸Šã€‚ç²’å­ç¢°æ’å’Œå¸å¼•åªä¼šå‘ç”Ÿåœ¨è¯¥åŒºåŸŸå†…ã€‚

å¦‚æœåœ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›å…¥/é€€å‡ºå±å¹•æ—¶ï¼Œç²’å­çªç„¶å‡ºç°/æ¶ˆå¤±ï¼Œåˆ™åº”è¯¥å¢å¤§çŸ©å½¢ã€‚\ :ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»£ç ï¼Œæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ **ç²’å­ â†’ ç”Ÿæˆ AABB** ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å·¥å…·ç”Ÿæˆã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¦‚æœè¯¥å±æ€§è¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸ºéé»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼Œ\ :ref:`visibility_aabb<class_GPUParticles3D_property_visibility_aabb>` ä¼šè¢« :ref:`GeometryInstance3D.custom_aabb<class_GeometryInstance3D_property_custom_aabb>` è¦†ç›–ã€‚

.. _class_GPUParticles3D_method_capture_aabb:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`AABB<class_AABB>` **capture_aabb**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GPUParticles3D_method_capture_aabb>`

è¿”å›åŒ…å«å½“å‰å¸§ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰æ´»åŠ¨ç²’å­çš„è½´å¯¹é½è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†ã€‚

.. _class_GPUParticles3D_method_convert_from_particles:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **convert_from_particles**\ (\ particles\: :ref:`Node<class_Node>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GPUParticles3D_method_convert_from_particles>`

è®¾ç½®è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å±æ€§ä»¥åŒ¹é…ç»™å®šçš„ :ref:`CPUParticles3D<class_CPUParticles3D>` èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_GPUParticles3D_method_emit_particle:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **emit_particle**\ (\ xform\: :ref:`Transform3D<class_Transform3D>`, velocity\: :ref:`Vector3<class_Vector3>`, color\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`, custom\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`, flags\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_GPUParticles3D_method_emit_particle>`

é»˜è®¤çš„ ParticleProcessMaterial å°†è¦†ç›– ``color`` å¹¶ä½¿ç”¨ ``custom`` çš„å†…å®¹ä½œä¸º ``(rotation, age, animation, lifetime)``\ ã€‚
